name: Cold Case (Dead4Never)
description:
Team Name: Game Ogre Studios

Nathanael Orosco (Programmer)

Juho Huttunen (Enviroment Artist)

Paavo Huttunen (Character/Prop Artist)

Connor Giebler (Story Writer)

Ian Underwood (Story Writer)

Game Details:

Detective Wulfe enters a long abandoned summer camp to investigate a forgotten case of a missing boy named Simon. Upon arrival Wulfe encounters Simon's spirit whom asks for help on finding the other children and his body. Find all the clues to help Simon remember how to help you enter the portal and save the forgotten children.
